channel.title: GeneWise on SR-C
channel.description: Recent content in GeneWise on SR-C

item.title: GeneWise的安装
item.description: 软件下载 1 2 wget http://www.ebi.ac.uk/~birney/wise2/wise2.4.1.tar.gz tar zxf ~/software/wise2.4.1.tar.gz -C ~/opt/ 软件编译 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 cd /opt/biosoft/wise2.4.1/src/ cd HMMer2 sed 's/getline/getline_new/' sqio.c > a && mv a sqio.c cd .. perl -p -i -e 's/isnumber/isdigit/' models/phasemodel.c make all echo 'PATH=$PATH:~/opt/wise2.4.1/src/bin/' >> ~/.bashrc echo 'WISECONFIGDIR=~/opt/wise2.4.1/wisecfg/' >> ~/.bashrc 这里修改了两个文件HMMer
